content:
Yes, some of the restaurants on the list have outdoor seating options. Here are a few:

1. Leyton Star - This pub and restaurant has a nice beer garden and some outdoor seating.

2. The Coach and Horses - They have a lovely outdoor seating area, which would be perfect for enjoying some traditional British comfort food.

3. Queen's Arms - They have an outdoor seating area where you can enjoy some classic pub food, like bangers and mash or fish and chips.

Please note that outdoor seating availability may vary depending on the weather and the restaurant's capacity. It may be a good idea to call ahead or check the restaurant's website or social media pages to confirm outdoor seating options.
